attributes.action: Demand the 7 'LABOUR' Independents stand in by elections for their seats .
attributes.additional_details: These 7 MP's seem determined to further make a mockery of the democratic process they have refused to acknowledge through out the past 30 months . Most of these , who have quit so far have actively denied the Referendum result and worked against the wishes of their constituents to keep us in the EU . It is time they became accountable at the Ballot Box . They want a PEOPLE's Vote ....so do their constituents . This will send a message to the others who ignore their electors .
attributes.background: 7 Pro EU Labour MP's have stood down from the Labour party . They refuse to have a PEOPLE's Vote for their seats . We demand they are made to do so .
